title: Identify two shifts that decrease output on graph

content.description: According to the graph above, which of the following will necessarily result in a decrease in output?
content.question: A rightward shift of the aggregate demand curve A leftward shift of the aggregate demand curve A rightward shift of the aggregate supply curve A leftward shift of the aggregate supply curve

topic.text: 3.6: Changes in the AD-AS Model in the Short Run

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs when there are multiple contributing variables, or what multiple actions should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
